# Structured Literature Review for Universal and Lighweight Cloud-Edge Orchestration 

## Required Libraries

```{r}
if(!require(kableExtra)){
    install.packages("kableExtra")
    library(kableExtra)
}
if(!require(tidyverse)){
    install.packages("tidyverse")
    library(tidyverse)
}
```

## Constants

```{r}

```

## Read the csv

```{r}
nodes <- read.csv("csv/nodes.csv")
```

## Modify values

```{r}
nodes.mutated <- nodes %>% mutate_at(c("Cloud","Fog","Edge","Gateway"), funs(gsub('y',"\\\\ding{151}",.,fixed=FALSE)))
```

## Export as LaTeX Table

```{r}
save_kable(kbl(nodes.mutated, "latex", escape = FALSE), "latex/nodes.tex")
```
